channel.title: New Home!
channel.description:
kk well im starting a new server and i wanna know! where would a good new home area be like varrock edge lummy cammy ancient pyrimid and all them are like on ever server so i wanna find a new place but where WHERE would a good place be! if u have a good idea but dont want everyone to no please pm so that not everyones server becomes that home area... thx
regards pwnage2u

item.title: New Home!
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

Just go on your server and walk around the whole place until you find a decent spot to base your home.

The attatched file will help.

Read full topic
